name: Lagos
description: The commercial capital of Nigeria, known for its vibrant nightlife and business opportunities.
highlights: Victoria Island; Lekki Conservation Centre; National Museum

name: Abuja
description: The capital city of Nigeria, known for its modern architecture and political significance.
highlights: Aso Rock; National Mosque; Millennium Park

name: Calabar
description: A historic city in southern Nigeria, known for its colonial architecture and cultural heritage.
highlights: Calabar Museum; Tinapa Resort; Obudu Cattle Ranch

name: Kano
description: One of Nigeria's oldest cities, known for its rich history and traditional crafts.
highlights: Kano City Walls; Gidan Makama Museum; Kurmi Market
